text: A 3rd-year student studying Computer Science at the University of Michigan College of Engineering who is interested in exploring bleeding-edge web technologies and machine learning algorithms. I am experienced in web systems, database management, and desktop and mobile app development. Currently, I am conducting research under the Radiological Health Engineering Lab, where I am designing machine learning models to learn from live radiation data.

languages.programming: C/C++, Java, C#, Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, MatLab, Swift, SQL
languages.markup: HTML, XML, YAML, CSS, LaTex, Markdown, Mermaid

infrastructures.cloud: Amazon Web Services, Google Cloud, Heroku
